drove them away and tried to conceal them. 
"But am I not too cold with him?" thought the princess. "I try to be reserved because in the depth of my soul I feel too near to him al- ready, but then he cannot know what I think of him and may imagine that I do not like him." 
And Princess Mary tried, but could not man- age, to be cordial to her new guest. "Poor girl, she's devilish ugly!" thought Anatole.
